Message.MsgText: CWSAB1001E=CWSAB1001E: An active transaction is on the thread.
Message.Explanation: A transaction strategy of Never was specified, but there was an active transaction on the thread.
Message.UserResponse: Either remove the transaction, or use an alternative transaction strategy.

Message.MsgText: CWSAB1000E=CWSAB1000E: No active transaction on the thread.
Message.Explanation: A transaction strategy of Mandatory was specified, but there was no active transaction on the thread.
Message.UserResponse: Either provide a transaction, or use an alternative transaction strategy.

Message.MsgText: CWSAB1002E=CWSAB1002E: Unable to select a transaction strategy because of ambiguous component metadata. Cold not choose between {0} for component {1}.
Message.Explanation: A transaction strategy needs to be selected for the component, but the component metadata has two or more transaction strategies that can be selected.
Message.UserResponse: Resolve the ambiguous component metadata so that only a single transaction strategy is specified.
